item.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis: 5/19/2016
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Analysis: 5/19/2016

Bitcoin's price, unable to form a turn to growth, is continuing its downward trend. That movement is approaching a long-term resistance line, from which it may rebound up. After breaking through the key level of $455, Bitcoin's price could not fortify it.

item.title: A Wikipedia Edit War Has Broken out over Ethereum-Based DAO
item.description:
A Wikipedia Edit War Has Broken out over Ethereum-Based DAO

The Ethereum created DAO has become one of the largest crowdsale in history, overtaking today the video game project Star Citizen, which has been a multi-year effort to raise $113,705,500. The DAO, a project curated by the founders of the Ethereum public blockchain, has raised $35 million more than that since May 28.

item.title: Apache Foundation Founder Named Hyperledger's First Executive Director - CoinDesk
item.description:
Apache Foundation Founder Named Hyperledger's First Executive Director - CoinDesk

There's a new man in charge of the Hyperledger Project, a group of more that 30 companies working together to build an open standard for distributed ledgers across industries. Announced today, the founder of of the Apache Software Foundation, Brian Behlendorf, joins the open-source project as its first executive director.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Live Trade! - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Live Trade! - NEWSBTC

Here's what we are looking at trading in the markets this evening, alongside a look at our latest bitcoin price live trade. The Wednesday session is drawing to a close in Europe, and it's time to take our second look at what the markets presented today, and in turn, use this action to put forward a potential trading strategy as we head into the US afternoon, and beyond that, into the Asian session this evening.

item.title: IBM Calls For Government To Play A Support Role For 'Permissioned Blockchain'
item.description:
IBM Calls For Government To Play A Support Role For 'Permissioned Blockchain'

IBM sees blockchain technology as an essential tool for business, government, and society, and as such, its development calls for government support, according to Jerry Cuomo, the company's vice president of blockchain technologies. He believes the technology can transform commerce as well as interactions between individuals and governments.

item.title: HolyTransaction's CEO Explains New Multicurrency Wallet Features
item.description:
HolyTransaction's CEO Explains New Multicurrency Wallet Features

HolyTransaction CEO Francesco Simonetti talks to Cointelegraph about new opportunities opened to him by going into Bitcoin, and explains what is different about his wallet. Simonetti is a co-founder of AssoBit, Crypto College Network Italy and Bitcoin Foundation Italy.

item.title: Dr. Jochen Hoenicke Joins SatoshiLabs R&D Team
item.description:
Dr. Jochen Hoenicke Joins SatoshiLabs R&D Team

Prague-based SatoshiLabs, makers of bitcoin hardware wallet TREZOR, have welcomed ethical hacker and cryptography expert Dr Jochen Hoenicke aka johoe, to the TREZOR R&D team. Dr Hoenicke will be working on cryptography functions for the new version of the SatoshiLabs' bitcoin hardware wallet, TREZOR 2.

item.title: HolyTransaction's CEO Explains New Multicurrency Wallet Features
item.description:
HolyTransaction's CEO Explains New Multicurrency Wallet Features

HolyTransaction CEO Francesco Simonetti talks to Cointelegraph about new opportunities opened to him by going into Bitcoin, and explains what is different about his wallet. Simonetti is a co-founder of AssoBit, Crypto College Network Italy and Bitcoin Foundation Italy.

item.title: On Blockchain Disillusionment and Bitcoin's Big Bad Wolves - CoinDesk
item.description:
On Blockchain Disillusionment and Bitcoin's Big Bad Wolves - CoinDesk

Beneath the headlines, there's arguably been the early stirrings of a sea change in the blockchain industry. There's a new trough of disillusionment, but this time its those working with blockchain applications, not bitcoin, who are being affected.

item.title: "Dr. Evil" Facing 25 years for Bitcoin Ransom Hack Attack
item.description:
"Dr. Evil" Facing 25 years for Bitcoin Ransom Hack Attack

"Dr. Evil" Facing 25 years for Bitcoin Ransom Hack Attack Crime doesn't always pay if you're a criminal who happens to love Bitcoin. The naive have sought to criminalize Bitcoin since it has become the preferred currency of the criminals in the hacking online community.
